mapper.select: select count(inbound_entry_id) from e_inbound_entry where entry_date = date('now')
mapper.insert: insert into e_inbound_entry( inbound_entry_id, entry_date, creation_date, total_cost, invoice_type, drawer, partner_company_id, department_id, warehouse_id, remark, classification, shipping_cost, shipping_cost_type, shipping_quantity, shipping_number, shipping_method_id, shipping_cost_serial, return_date, return_serial, print_times ) values ( #{inboundEntryID}, #{entryDate}, #{creationDate}, #{totalCost}, #{invoiceType}, #{drawer}, #{partnerCompanyID}, #{departmentID}, #{warehouseID}, #{remark}, #{classification}, #{shippingCost}, #{shippingCostType}, #{shippingQuantity}, #{shippingNumber}, #{shippingMethodID}, #{shippingCostSerial}, #{returnDate}, #{returnSerial}, #{printTimes}, #{printTimes} )
mapper.select: select inbound_entry_id, shipping_cost, shipping_cost_type, shipping_number, shipping_method_id, c.abbreviated_name as relevant_company_name from e_inbound_entry as i join c_relevant_company as c on i.shipping_method_id = c.relevant_company_id where inbound_entry_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update e_inbound_entry set shipping_cost = #{shippingCost}, shipping_cost_type = #{shippingCostType}, shipping_quantity = #{shippingQuantity}, shipping_number = #{shippingNumber}, shipping_method_id = #{shippingMethodID} where inbound_entry_id = #{inboundEntryID}
mapper.select: select inbound_entry_id, total_cost, invoice_type, drawer, i.department_id, d.name as department_name, i.remark from e_inbound_entry as i join e_department as d on i.department_id = d.department_id where inbound_entry_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update e_inbound_product set quantity = #{quantity}, remark = #{remark}, tax_rate = #{taxRate}, unit_price_without_tax = #{unitPriceWithoutTax}, unit_price_with_tax = #{unitPriceWithTax} where inbound_product_id = #{inboundProductID}
